title: ProposalVotesResponse
description: This structure describes a proposal vote response.

against_power.description: Total amount of `against` votes for a proposal.

aligned_power.description: Total amount of `align` votes for a proposal.

amendment_power.description: Total amount of `amend` votes for a proposal.

for_power.description: Total amount of `for` votes for a proposal

removal_power.description: Total amount of `remove` votes for a proposal.
